title: Microsoft Edgeâ€™s built-in VPN is now available in the Canary channel
content:
Microsoft has begun testing Microsoft Edge’s Secure Network feature – essentially a built-in VPN service – with select Insiders in the Canary channel. Secure Network is powered by Cloudflare, and as the name suggests, it’s meant to add a layer of security and privacy by encrypting your data as you browse the web. When Microsoft

The post Microsoft Edge’s built-in VPN is now available in the Canary channel appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has announced that some Insiders in the Canary channel can now test Edge's Secure Network, a built-in VPN powered by Cloudflare.
